HOME.INTRO: Welcome to the Ulala mobile game strategy management site!

SUCCESSMESSAGES.ACCOUNTACTIVATED: Your account has been activated, you will be redirect to home page. Have fun!
SUCCESSMESSAGES.KEYSEND: Mail sent, look in your mailbox! (And don't forget the spam!)
SUCCESSMESSAGES.STRATUPLOAD: Strategy well imported, thank you for sharing!
SUCCESSMESSAGES.REGISTER: You registred succefuly. You can log in at the top right of the screen
SUCCESSMESSAGES.ADDTEAM: Your team has been added successfully!
SUCCESSMESSAGES.EDITTEAM: Your team has been updated successfully!
SUCCESSMESSAGES.SENDUSERNAME: Your username has been sent in your mail box. Don't forget to check your spam box!
SUCCESSMESSAGES.GENERATEPASSWORD: Your new password has been send to your mail box. Don't forget to check your spam box!

ERRORMESSAGES.WRONGACTIVATIONKEY: Wrong activation key, please try again. In case of problem, please contact the site administrator via the contact page.
ERRORMESSAGES.SAVAGEERROR: Oops, a wild error seems to have occurred, please contact the site administrator via the contact page.
ERRORMESSAGES.STRATUPLOAD: Oops, a wild error seems to have occurred, please try again.
ERRORMESSAGES.BADIMAGEFORMAT: Your files must be with extension JPG or PNG.
ERRORMESSAGES.SAMEIMAGEFORMAT: Your 4 files must be same extension.
ERRORMESSAGES.BADIMAGE: Your 4 images must be as specified in the help (see next to the title to show help).
ERRORMESSAGES.SELECTIMAGES: Select the 4 images of your strategy.
ERRORMESSAGES.TRYAGAIN: Oops an error occured. Please try again.

VALIDATORS.MAILTAKEN: This mail is already in use.
VALIDATORS.PASSWORDMAX: Your password can't have more than 40 caracters.
VALIDATORS.PASSWORDMIN: Your password can't have less than 8 caracters.
VALIDATORS.TEAMNAMEREQUIRED: The name of the team is required.

INFOMESSAGES.RETRIEVEPASSWORD: Lost your password or username? Please click here!

ACTIVATION.TITLE: Activation
ACTIVATION.ENTERTOKEN: Please enter your activation key received by email.
ACTIVATION.ACTIVATIONKEYNOTRECEIVED: You didn't receive your activation key?

ADDSTRATEGY.TITLE: Add a strategy
ADDSTRATEGY.HELP:
Informations about adding strategies :

1 - Select all fields : Continent, Zone, Boss, and the 4 classes of your strategy.
2 - Upload the 4 images of your strategy : All 4 images must be jpg or png and of the same extension.

Expected image type :

(No other images will be accepted)
ADDSTRATEGY.USETEAMSEARCH: Use search with a personal team
ADDSTRATEGY.NOTEAM: You don't have favorite team yet. If you want to create one to make the import faster and easier :

ADMINSTRAT.TITLE: Strategy Management
ADMINSTRAT.MESSMODAL1: Are you sure you want to delete this strategy?

RETRIEVE.TITLE: Retrieve my password or username
RETRIEVE.INTRO: Please fill in your E-mail and then choose the action to be taken.

RGPD.TITLE: Managing your data
RGPD.TEXT: Your data will remain private and will never be passed on to a third party. The images of the strategies will be accessible to everyone.

SEARCH.TITLE: Search strategies
SEARCH.NOTEAM: You have no personal team yet. If you want to create one to make the search easier :
SEARCH.NOSTRAT: Oops, no strategy found. Maybe try with less filters!
SEARCH.HELP:
1 - Select continent + zone + boss.
2 - Select classes if (optionnal)
SEARCH.HELPUSER:
If you have personal team in My infos>My favorite teams :
1 - Select your team.
2 - Select your boss.
the research will take inot account the 4 classes of your team
